name: Sproom
overview:
Sproom is a business network, bringing together electronic structured exchange of invoices, orders, notifications etc. between buyers and suppliers. The technology brings together the many different national and international carrier networks into one large network and is in contrast to other solutions able to ‘translate’ an invoice, depending on the recipient’s specific requirements.

Our target customers are top 500 enterprises in every country and all their SME suppliers. The suppliers pay per processed invoice and the extended services they subscribe to.

Sproom makes exchange of electronic business documents available to all types of businesses by establishing an exchange platform that binds a global business network together, removing barriers for sending and receiving business data electronically. It gives small businesses access to electronic data interchange with improved cash flow management and traceability to follow and provides larger organizations with full value for their purchased e-procurement solutions which now cover all their partners.
